track.name: Love Somebody
comments: One of those rare music that manages to lift my ass from the chair.
f i fall for you, i'll never recover ♡ if i fall for you, i'll never be the same ♡ [4]
f i fall for you, i'll never recover ♡ if i fall for you, i'll never be the same ♡ [3]
if i fall for you, i'll never recover ♡ if i fall for you, i'll never be the same ♡ [2]
reminds me of burial - loner, that bubbly synth line sounds exactly like the one in loner
''Love me today, don't leave me tomorrow'' ♥
if i fall for you, i'll never recover ♡  if i fall for you, i'll never be the same ♡
Reminds me of 'Dancing On My Own' by Robyn. So goooood.
Reminds me of "Dance With Somebody" by Whitney Houston.
The music video of Love Someday has just been debuted! :D
Well you got what you wanted tomps, cuz it is indeed their next single :-)
The best song on the album. I love it sooooooooo musch :) <3
